name: template-react-ts
description: A Phaser 3 TypeScript project template that demonstrates React communication and uses Vite for bundling.
author: Phaser Studio <support@phaser.io> (https://phaser.io/)

scripts.build: node log.js build & vite build --config vite/config.prod.mjs
scripts.deploy: yarn build && zip -r joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.zip dist && scp joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.zip boz:/var/www && ssh boz "cd /var/www && rm -rf joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.bak && mv joguinho.nandoburgos.dev joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.bak && unzip joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.zip && mv dist joguinho.nandoburgos.dev && rm -rf joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.zip" && rm -rf joguinho.nandoburgos.dev.zip
